dmca.title: [ABUSE] Cease and Desist - CISSP
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, December 12, 2005 2:24 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; dmorrow@isc2.org
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Cease and Desist - CISSP]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Cease and Desist - CISSP
Date: Mon, 5 Dec 2005 20:48:26 -0600
From: Dorsey Morrow, CISSP-ISSMP <dmorrow@isc2.org>
Reply-To: dmorrow@isc2.org
Organization: (ISC)2, Inc.
To: <info@real-itquestions.com>
CC: adimns@theplanet.com, abuse@theplanet.com

James,

I serve as General Counsel to the International Information Systems Security
Certification Consortium, Inc., also commonly known as (ISC)
